item.title: Check Login Given via Google Chrome Dev Tools
item.description: Sometimes, you would like to know what your input credentials in browser. Do the following via Google Chrome Developer Tools: 1Chrome DevTools > Network > Fetch/XHR > login > Payload where login refers to something like https://api.myproject.local/v1/login
